value.stringValue: Your Comp Request {!myVariable_current.Name} Needs Attention before it can be Approved, please check the current status reason and comments from Finance for further instruction

actionCalls.name: myRule_1_A3
actionCalls.label: Comp Request Needs Attention Email Alert

value.stringValue: Reminder, Your Comp Request {!myVariable_current.Name} Needs Attention
Reminder, Your Comp Request {!myVariable_current.Name} Needs Attention - Please review your request and/or cancel your request by selecting the "Cancel Request" checkbox.
Reminder, Your Comp Request {!myVariable_current.Name} has not been submitted
Reminder, Your Comp Request {!myVariable_current.Name} has not been submitted for approval - Please submit for approval or cancel your request by selecting the "Cancel Request" checkbox.

Flow.description: Assigns back to submitter on "Needs Attention" and sends alert if Comp Request has not been "Submitted for Approval"
Flow.label: !Comp_Request_Actions_Process
